body.subject: Deployment acknowledged - staged rollout in progress
body.summary: Acknowledged deployment unblocking and staged rollout start. Deployment.json status updated to READY. All quality gates passed, all blocker requirements met. Monitoring and rollback plans ready. Proceeding with staged rollout per deployment.json.
key_points: Deployment unblocked: status changed from BLOCKED to READY
Quality approval confirmed: release_gate: true, all quality gates passed
Deployment readiness confirmed: all blocker requirements met
Deployment strategy: staged rollout (staging → canary → production) with validation gates
Monitoring ready: Prometheus metrics exported, structured logging configured
Rollback plans ready: per-task, full, partial - all tested
body.action_needed: Proceed with staged rollout per deployment.json. Monitor metrics and health checks at each stage. Report deployment status and any issues via structured messages. Quality engineer will monitor deployment metrics and validate quality gates remain satisfied in production.
